alert.note: Alert for Bowie; Camp; Morris; Red River; Titus; Upshur (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 30 at 7:22AM CDT until March 30 at 7:45AM CDT by NWS Shreveport
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 745 AM CDT FOR SOUTHWESTERN BOWIE...NORTHWESTERN UPSHUR...MORRIS...TITUS...CAMP AND SOUTHEASTERN RED RIVER COUNTIES... At 722 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Wilkerson to near Leesburg, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Mount Pleasant, Pittsburg, Leesburg, Daingerfield, Naples, Omaha, Cason, Us 259 And I 30 Intersection, Wilkerson, Cookville, Rocky Branch, Newsome, Dalby Springs, Winfield, Miller`s Cove, Rocky Mound, Lydia, Monticello, Roeder and Harvard. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 100 PM CDT for northeastern Texas. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: Bowie; Camp; Morris; Red River; Titus; Upshur
